website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice at a modest price if you're not looking for a crib that will convert to a full-size bed.
pros: Mattress adjusts to 4 different positions to accommodate the needs of a growing infant
cons: Will not hold a traditional crib skirt, as there is a metal bar in the way

website_summaries.verdict: Meets the basic sleeping needs of newborns and older kids.
pros: Converts from rib to daybed to toddler bed
Keeps kids safe and secure from infancy to toddler years
We love that the adjustable mattress can be customized for each child's comfort level
cons: Some reports of the paint chipping

customer_reviews.title: Softwood crib with attrocious customer service
customer_reviews.text: This softwood crib came with dents and scratches. In two places, the wood was splintered. We contacted the manufacturer multiple times by email and phone, though we never got a reply. We wish we had bought our grandchild a different brand, and since Babtletto has never acknowledged any communications, we are simply walking away from this terrible purchase. Softwood makes shipping less expensive, sure, and it's a lousy choice for a crib.
customer_reviews.author: David C. King

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: No missing or broken parts or hardware, easy for two people to assemble, sturdy, and looks great! It's exactly what I wanted! ONLY CON, my biggest pet peeve is giant stickers on a products surface that take rubbing alcohol and a razor blade to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsers

customer_reviews.title: New Zealand Pine...?
customer_reviews.text: There's not much among the reviews that has not been said; so I will address the one variable that I was wondering about when I ordered this... Is New Zealand Pine closer to Balsa Wood or Oak...? Will it snap like a twig in the wind...? I'm happy to report that this Pine is not really as soft as I expected (feared). It's not Oak, that's for sure, but I own some Maple furniture and I'd say it's closer to that. I was happily surprised by the relative hardness while being as light as it is. Nice product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Suburban New York

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: The crib is nice. Very nice design. However the quality is basically a step above Ikea. A small step. The screws and other harware will strip, won't always fit perfectly and you'll end up with gaps here and there. If you don't mind that, you'll be fine, but for the price I expected more than Ikea plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib! Prettier in person than in the pictures. Good price, sturdy and it was easy to put together. I’m pregnant and did it all by myself. It’s great for short moms. Not quite as tall as most cribs.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Best crib out there! Comfortable! Stylish! Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this crib! It is stylish, beautiful, sturdy!!! It is everything you might want! We have been using it for 2,5 years now! It is very comfortable for mom and baby. You just need a good mattress! Mattress height can be adjusted for different age and size. We used it as a crib for the first year and then converted it into a toddler bed. Works great both ways. My daughter is rather tall for 2,5 and I only now star thinking about a bigger bed. I feel kind of sad to put this one away. It might have been one of the best purchases I made for my baby!
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Crib!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crib, after a couple of months of research I settled on this crib and cannot be more pleased. The crib is solid, has four mattress settings, and a clean modern look. Bonus points that it came with the toddler rail.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for shorter mommas!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this crib. I was initially hesitant because the lines are more modern, but it fits perfectly in our more traditional nursery. I’m not a tall person, so the lower profile of this crib has been great because I can actually reach my baby even when the crib is on a lower setting.
customer_reviews.author: Neen

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in Great Shape
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this crib. Our toddler used this as a baby and then converted into a toddler bed until about age 3.5, when we moved him up to a standard twin size. We ordered a second crib because we are expecting twins. Nice free shipping from Amazon Prime. Arrived in good condition. Easy to assemble. Pretty, timeless style. I plan to pass these on to my younger siblings when they start having kids. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: MookieL

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and quality looks great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to follow directions
customer_reviews.text: The crib arrived in perfect condition, but was rather a nightmare to assemble. Being accustomed to directions that are idiot-proof (IKEA), the directions provided with the crib were so vague, we literally had to disassemble the crib twice before finally figuring out when to use the two long screws and when to use the different sized dowels. You could save purchasers an enormous amount of aggravation if you would simply include those small tips at the beginning of the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Marler Philip

customer_reviews.title: Classic crib, decently easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Have assembled this crib for baby but the baby isn’t here yet so I can’t speak for ease of putting the baby in yet. Took about an hour but only need the included Allen key and a hammer , no drills. Has a few settings so we set it up on the highest setting first which seems to be reachable for someone short. Feels sturdy. Bought the newton waterproof mattress and it fits perfectly with no gaps on the side .
customer_reviews.author: Rambon

customer_reviews.title: great for short people
customer_reviews.text: what attracted me to this crib was not only the design but also the fact that its a little shorter than other cribs. this works well for me as i'm 5ft 2in. got the natural washed color and it matches everything in her room perfectly. the crib was easy to assemble, just follow the pictures. would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: min2be

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crib!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this crib. The wood is smooth and sturdy and my husband and I put it together in a couple of hours (being very careful to get it right, but it was pretty easy!). I also think it's a good price point. Many other cribs we looked at and they are much more expensive. The crib is bigger than I thought, I can see our little baby having 3-4 years of sleeping in this bed. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Mustikka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought the matching crib/dresser/mattress (pure) and it arrived quickly without damage. We assembled pretty easily and had no problems with instructions. I probably couldn't have got the spring base attached by myself being 9 months pregnant. We love the modern look and hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous crib! The color was a tad lighter than I was expecting but I still love it. The assembly was rather straightforward, and took no more than 30 minutes. The adjustable height mattress spring feels sturdy and secure. After assembly I gave each side of the crib a good shake to gauge strength, and this crib felt solid, not flimsy. I also love that it came with a toddler conversion kit, aka a new side rail. In addition to safety I love how versatile this crib is, it will go with lots of nursery themes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful retro crib
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful crib in person. It has the retro mod look i was searching for. My son is now 2.5 and had this crib since birth. We had used all the mattress settings and now using the toddler rail that came with it as a toddler bed. I highly recommend this crib, it still lookd like the day we bought it. I plan on gifting it to a lucky baby soon.
customer_reviews.author: Seree Collie

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Not Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, relatively easy to put together so long as you pay attention to the holes in the diagram (almost did the wrong side!). The foot print was smaller than we thought when the box showed up which is a good thing. Overall very satisfied and excited with our purchase. This crib looks clean, elegant and is perfect for our daughters little space.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product but Arrvied Damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: what a beautiful crib, sadly mine arrived with a big old chip out of it. Sad that their quality control missed this before sending it out. ;(
customer_reviews.author: Kylie S. Woodard

customer_reviews.title: High price, low quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this crib about 2 months ago. The crib has barely been used because baby mostly sleeps in the snoo and we are slowly transitioning baby out of snoo into crib. However, the paint has already chipped off on several spots. This is very disappointing because my baby is very young and so it is unclear how the paint chipped off from basically no use at all. It’s expensive for no reason because it is very low quality. On a more positive note, it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Missing two pre-drilled screw holes.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together, took about 20 minutes (not counting the time to organize and discard all the Styrofoam and cardboard). However, the product was missing two pre-drilled screw holes, one of which was a base screw, and the other being a middle attachment-screw that connects one of the sides to one of the end pieces. Very poor quality control by the manufacturer, and an issue I've never encountered before.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ahmadi

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointed in the material..
customer_reviews.text: I bought natural wood one but it looks like plastic with woodish prints.. I expected more like wood feeling and touch but it feels just cheap and lighweight cold plastic. I def. expected more than this for the price....
customer_reviews.author: Vegasmom

customer_reviews.title: Love the Hudson
customer_reviews.text: Love our crib. We were specifically looking for something with clean lines and no "headboard" style to it. We love the way the crib looks, it was relatively easy to put together and decently light weight to move around the room as needed. I am very happy that it comes with the toddler rail for when we are ready to transition him to the toddler bed. The quality seems to be great, and the look is exactly what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: KWeb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, style, and safety
customer_reviews.text: This crib has lasted us through 3 babies and has been perfect. The crib is durable, simple and the mid century look was perfect. The materials chosen for construction were what we were looking for to keep our LO safe and be eco friendlier. The two height settings were just the right height for myself (5’4”) and the baby. We did not have an issue of crawling up and out. I would recommend this crib to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern look but minor cosmetic damage
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Babyletto Hudson line and especially the grey/white crib! Reason for the 3stars was it had minor cosmetic damage to the railing and sides, but it wasn't worth it to take it apart and send back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Convertible Crib, Came Dented
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my baby shower and for the price I was expecting a little more - like it to not come in a wrecked box and dented in several places. It took away from the overall beauty of the crib. Other than that it sturdy, well made and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: D2 Chicago

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The height of the mattress is very useful as the kid grows and theres a replacement front piece (gate) so the kid can get in and out at will. Sturdy and quite pretty as well. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mihai

customer_reviews.title: Easy decision! Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought that crib for my two-year-old and loved it. So it was a no brainer that I got another one for my six month old!!
customer_reviews.author: Sybille K

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good little crib
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have very high expectations actually. Figured they were all just basic cribs. But this is quite sturdy. Better than most $400 cribs found at Target or Buy Buy Baby. Assembly can be a pain. The included S-shaped allen wrench is great, but there are so many screws requiring it. Yup, I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Nam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great crib, easy to assemble and great price AND it turns into a toddler bed!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy_D

customer_reviews.title: Wood color looks much more white than birch
customer_reviews.text: We love the crib itself. But this color appears to look like a birch in the photos and actually appears much more white in real life (white wash over the wood) we still like it but was very different than we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib. Sturdy and beautiful. 4/5 because it was not the easiest to assemble. Pretty confusing at times.
customer_reviews.author: manlytoe

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier with this product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the crib and matching changing table. Couldn't be happier with this product. They have a nice mid-century modern appearance, and while being minimalist in design offer a sturdy feel. Assembly was a breeze and bolts have not come loose in a years time. Wood material itself is kind of soft, so be careful while vacuuming or doing anything that could take chip out of the paint/wood. Looks just as good as some of the other much more expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed crib!
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib!! Our baby is due in a few weeks so we can't speak to using it with the baby yet. However as far as looks and ease of assembly go, we are so happy! It fits our modern nursery perfectly and assembly was very straight forward! Overall, very happy with our purchase! After tons of research, we also purchased the Moonlight Slumber Little Dreamer crib mattress from amazon. It fits this crib perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: It's fine, a bit of a pain to set up -- maybe because i didnt pay attention. It's lightweight but still feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: P$

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL, STYLISH CRIB
customer_reviews.text: We bought this crib for our expectant daughter. It arrived at her home on time as promised and within a short time she sent us a picture of the crib her husband had assembled with a friend. She was so happy with how it looked in her baby nursery, which in turn made us so happy. We have nothing but good things to say about the delivery and the crib itself. Looking forward to seeing our newest grandson sleep in his beautiful crib.
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This crib arrived on great condition - no scratches, dings, or mismatched holes. It took 30 minutes max for my husband to put together and looks exactly how it is pictured. The wood is solid and good quality, especially for the price. I would recommend this brand (and purchasing it from Amazon) to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood is not nice
customer_reviews.text: I payed allot for this and expected nicer heavy wood its not its very light
customer_reviews.author: pinky

customer_reviews.title: Modern and functional
customer_reviews.text: The crib looks great! We started out with the washed natural color but it didn't have the natural wood look we were going for and was more of a pink tone, so we exchanged it for the white version. The crib is simple, yet very stylish and will look great with some fun patterned sheets. I hope our baby likes it when she comes in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Marlana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Coloring of “washed natural” looked different in pictures than in person. So we exchanged it....
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered this crib in the “washed natural”. I thought it would show more of the wood colored. In the pictures it looked like it showed more up the wood. But it looked pretty much just white washed. So we returned it and got the all white one. We have been very pleased with that one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great crib
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and protected so box damage didn’t damage crib parts with shipping. Easy to assemble (did it myself in under one hour at 33 weeks pregnant). Beautiful low profile crib, easy access for shorter moms. Very sturdy when assembled. The wood is a softer wood so will be easily dented but no funny smells with the material when taken out of box
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to build and got alot of compliments. It does have some stickers on the side which i was not able to remove but looks really nice. I built it with the help of my wife
customer_reviews.author: Fer & Sara

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Crib arrived in a well packaged box. I had no problem with assembly, and only needed my husband's help while installing the mattress support. Other than that it's a 1 person job. It looks great and is sturdy. My only issue is the caution/warning sticker on each side panel that faces outwards. I tried to take one off and it ended up looking worse, but it's not a big enough inconvenience to remove any stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Legge

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, very sturdy and durable, and arrived in perfect condition. Assembly was easy, could be done by one person in about 10 minutes. Meausrements were also true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Adage6

customer_reviews.title: Overall we are very pleased with this crib
customer_reviews.text: Overall we are very pleased with this crib. The first one Amazon sent was slightly defective making it impossible for pieces to align properly for assembly. Once a new crib was sent (and having to lug the whole first crib to a nearby UPS store), assembly was pretty smooth. My husband had it put together in less than an hour on his own without much difficulty. The crib is modern, sturdy and much less expensive than some other cribs with similar looks. We bought a standard crib mattress and it fit without any issue. Baby hasn't yet arrived so we can't comment on the ease of lowering the height for a bit but overall we're pretty pleased!
customer_reviews.author: slippers23

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase if you are a perfectionist
customer_reviews.text: Came with those holes or dents everyone talked about in reviews. Pretty crib but if imperfections bothers you don’t buy it. All of the cribs have dents on top revilings that are painted over but very visible as soon as you come close to crib. I would go with something else for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib, looks great with the matching changing table as well. Good quality and came perfectly packed with no damage. Love the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Darling minimalist crib
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is expecting her 1st. She picked this crib for minimalist profile and sustainable materials. They love it! Nice that the conversion kit is included.
customer_reviews.author: NanNY

customer_reviews.title: Love my crib
customer_reviews.text: Crib was easily put together. It looks great in the nursery. I'm not sure what other cribs are like so this might be standard but my only complaint is the placement of the bars at the bottom. It makes it difficult for under bed storage. Most of my items - including diapers don't fit I would have to lift the crib to get them under which isn't feasible.
customer_reviews.author: Caresse

customer_reviews.title: Not the color it shows in pics
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the color of this product.. the white with natural wash crib. The “natural” poles are not natural looking, they look white... so the whole crib appears white. If I wanted a white crib I would of ordered one! Nothing unique about this crib now.. super upset about this, looks nothing like the pics!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and high quality crib
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and high quality crib! I love it. Instructions were clear and overall, took about an hour to assemble. Don't make the same mistake I did and assemble it in another room, because it will not fit through the door. I like that this comes with a conversion kit for a toddler bed, so no extra costs to convert. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn. We have been using it for 8 months now, and have seen no issues at all. It's sturdy, looks nice. It's a bit wide for our doors, so we had to disassemble when we decided to move the crib from our bedroom to the nursery. The assembly/disassembly was relatively easy but you need tools to do it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great crib at a great price
customer_reviews.text: After a review of locally available cribs we bought this one. The wood construction and quality is great. It passes my one finger push test and wasn't that hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chen

customer_reviews.title: good sized crib
customer_reviews.text: It's a good-looking, good sized crib...a bit low to the ground and had a crack on one of the railings. Expecting a little more for the price. Fits well in our small nursery and the white brightens the room.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well designed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this crib. I like that it is low enough to the ground that if a small child climbs over the rails, he is less likely to get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handsome!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this was "easy" to assemble because it took me at least an hour to do. But the directions were clear, and I was slow and deliberate and the end result is a very sturdy handsome crib. This is also the third one we have bought so clearly we like this crib!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT & SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Purchased and had it shipped to N. Dakota for my daughter and husbands first child. Yep I’m finally going to be a papa. They absolutely love this crib.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE L.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking modern crib for more than half the price of the more expensive competitors
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the look of the Oeuf cribs, but couldn't justify spending that much on something my baby would use for a couple of years. This crib was a great alternative. The gray and white combo is really modern and clean looking. The crib was easy enough for me to assemble by myself at 8 months pregnant and it looks great in the room. There are different height settings to grow with the baby as well as a toddler rail to add on once he outgrows the crib.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love but scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with this crib right away. Pretty decent quality for the price. Only problem is that the dark wood (we got the espresso/white) scratches easily. Also, the edges don't line up completely on one side but you can't tell unless you're looking for it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Roche Ponnock

customer_reviews.title: love this crib
customer_reviews.text: love this crib, but get rail protectors our daughter chewed one area and chewed the paint off - which would be impossible to touch up without noticig since the color is beautiful, but matching that exact gray wouldn't be possible
customer_reviews.author: C. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for short mommas!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is 4'11" and we had to research cribs that she would be able to get the baby in and out of. We put together and still needed to remove the legs. LOL He is rocked to sleep and she has to lean over to get him in crib. He also has to be all the way to the floor due to the fact that he is standing now. Once he is going down on his own or we start using it as a toddler bed we will reattach the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Massey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble crib that is safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Like the multiple mattress levels. Needs crib lining though - a separate purchase. Took 1 hour to assemble by one person.
customer_reviews.author: M Patel

customer_reviews.title: Solid feel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble if you lay it out and read directions. Adjusting the mattress height is a little tricky, but I advise to set it up, add the last side to the crib, and then tighten it fully. My baby hasn't arrived yet so I can't speak from personal experience, but my brother, a father of four boys, commented on how sturdy the crib felt. I'm glad I spent a little extra and got a good product that also looks so clean and modern. Thank you to previous reviewers for suggesting the Moonlight Slumber Little Dreamer Dual Firmness All Foam Mattress; it fits snugly and will be very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and packed.
customer_reviews.text: Crib was well packed and not a mark on it. Would have been better if I measured the doorway before assembling the crib in the living room. I had to remove the bottom frame to get it through the doorway. All in all the assembly was easy and looked great when done. The mattress we bought with it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This crib is exactly what I was looking for! I bought this crib because it was the exact size I needed to fit in an alcove in my spare bedroom. The crib is sturdy and looks great. My husband and I put this together in about 45 minutes (he kept stopping to watch the baseball game). My grandaughter loves the crib too! I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and great design!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made crib. I wasn't too sure about the two tone color but glad we got the two tone. The white bars make the crib more bright and aesthetically pleasing. It's half the cost of other crib brands with similar look and feel.. you know the brands i'm talking about. Glad we purchased this instead of spending twice the money.
customer_reviews.author: lulynyc

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in great condition! We purchased this for our second child since we gave our PBK crib away after our first son moved into a twin bed. We didn't want to spend too much with our second and loved the modern look of this crib. It's sleek, clean, and looks great in our nursery
customer_reviews.author: CarolineB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality crib
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality crib. It really is worth every penny and more. Looks very modern and we love it so far. It was very quick to put together, which was awesome. Took about 1.5 for my husband to put together on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Treat Yo Self

customer_reviews.title: The infant setting for the mattress height is perfect. We will get many years out of this ...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this crib!!!! The infant setting for the mattress height is perfect. We will get many years out of this crib/toddler bed.
customer_reviews.author: AMcCabe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have such a small nursery and are very picky about aesthetics and, boy, did we hit the jackpot! This crib is better than we could have hoped for! It’s classy and compact for a full-size crib
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Baby Crib
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crib for my grandson and my daughter was very happy with it. It looks really nice and is quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Jonusas

customer_reviews.title: Even Better in Person
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Easy assembly and looks better in person than it does in the photo. Shipping time was quick and professionally packaged. We purchased the Serta Nightstar Firm Crib and Toddler Mattress and it fit perfectly. There are no rough edges and the material is safe if your toddler likes to chew on it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great bed overall
customer_reviews.text: Product instructions did not match product. It looked like there was one set of directions for ever one of this company's bed sets.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib!
customer_reviews.text: Although my baby hasn't slept in it yet, the assembly was super easy. It didn't take long for us to put it together. All parts were included, so we didn't have an issue with missing parts. No dents or paint chips either. Very sturdy but also lightweight-ish in case it needs to be moved!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: All Around Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble (clear instructions), great design, and solid build quality. Glad we went for this one after reading all of the other positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: A & K

customer_reviews.title: This crib looks beautiful and modern
customer_reviews.text: This crib looks beautiful and modern; it appears very solid. Very easy to assemble and love that it is a convertible crib.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Modern and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and the price point. Obviously not an ouef but also much less expensive than the Ouef. Looks great and holds well.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money

The Hudson 3-in-1 Convertible Crib converts to both a toddler bed (rail included) and daybed, and is solidly built from sustainable New Zealand pine wood. Whether you prefer a contemporary or time-honored palette for your nursery, Hudson has you covered. Choose between a modern grey crib, clean white or natural, or a new take on family-friendly white/espresso two-tone.
